Directions: In a mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar and vanilla until fluffy. Gradually add cream, beating until thickened. Spoon mixture into 10 mounds on a waxed paper-lined baking sheet. Using the back of a spoon, shape into 3-in. cups. Freeze for 2 hours or overnight.
To serve, fill with strawberries and garnish with whipped topping.
Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) carton frozen whipped topping, thawed
